    • Constructor Detail

      • NonTemporalSlotConfiguration

        public NonTemporalSlotConfiguration(java.lang.String customId,
                                    java.lang.String adUnit,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Create a non-temporal slot configuration for the ad request
        Parameters:
        customId - custom ID of the slot. If slot with the same custom ID already exists, the invocation will be ignored.
        adUnit - ad unit of the ads allowed to be delivered into the slot. It can be a predefined ad unit like "display" or a custom ad unit defined in MRM.
        width - width of the slot in device-independent pixels
        height - height of the slot in device-independent pixels

    • Method Detail

      • getSlotInitialAdOption

        public IConstants.SlotInitialAdOption getSlotInitialAdOption()
        Get the initial ad option of the non-temporal slot.
        Returns:
        choice of the initial ad should be delivered into this slot.

      • setSlotInitialAdOption

        public void setSlotInitialAdOption(IConstants.SlotInitialAdOption initialAdOption)
        Set the initial ad option of the non-temporal slot.
        Parameters:
        initialAdOption - choice of the initial ad should be delivered into this slot.

      • getCompatibleDimensions

        public java.lang.String getCompatibleDimensions()
        Get compatible dimensions of the non-temporal slot.
        Returns:
        compatible dimensions in format of "width,height|width,height", like "320,240|480,720" or "320,240|480,720|728,90"

      • setCompatibleDimensions

        public void setCompatibleDimensions(java.lang.String compatibleDimensions)
        Set compatible dimensions of the non-temporal slot.
        Parameters:
        compatibleDimensions - compatible dimensions in format of "width,height|width,height", like "320,240|480,720" or "320,240|480,720|728,90"

        public int getWidth()
